PostToolUse.description: Suggest task creation when errors are detected

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_OUTPUT" | grep -qiE 'error|exception|fail|bug|crash'; then echo 'Error detected! Consider creating a Sugar task to fix this with /sugar-task' >&2; fi; exit 0

PostToolUse.description: Suggest task update after git commits

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'git commit'; then echo 'Code committed! If this completes a Sugar task, use: sugar update TASK_ID --status completed' >&2; fi; exit 0
